description: More than three million people are placed under new restrictions in and around the Spanish capital.
title: Coronavirus: Spain imposes partial lockdown on defiant Madrid
title_page: Coronavirus: Spain imposes partial lockdown on defiant Madrid - BBC News
maintext: "Trying to stop the spread by closing some neighbourhoods and not others doesn't work. On the other hand, putting all Madrid back into lockdown will be really hard. How are we going to manage if we're all unemployed? I don't know what's worse."
